author: Nick Nairn
method: For the chargrilled squid, rub the squid with the olive oil and season with salt and freshly ground black pepper.  Heat a griddle pan and cook the squid over a high heat for 1-2 minutes until lightly charred and cooked through. For the sauce vierge, place all of the sauce vierge ingredients into a small saucepan and warm through. To serve, place the chargrilled squid onto a plate with the sauce in a small bowl alongside.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz squid, cleaned, scored to make a diamond pattern,  1 tbsp olive oil,  salt and freshly ground black pepper ,  100g/3½oz green olives, pits removed, chopped,  1 tomato, chopped,  1 garlic clove, chopped,  pinch chilli flakes,  1 tbsp capers, chopped,  1 tbsp olive oil
